name: Menu
description: Here's a simulated restaurant menu made with React and TypeScript. You can add or remove your dish choices and also see the total of your order.

name: To-do list
description: This to-do list was built with React and offers several features to help you stay organized: add, erase, and sort tasks with ease.

name: Markdown previewer
description: This markdown previewer is a useful tool for writing documentation. With instant previewing, you can see your document come to life as you type.

name: Pomodoro timer
description: Why not trying the pomodoro's method to handle more efficiently your focus session, try to stay focus during the entire session length and deserve your break!
